text: Wild-Type and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Transgenic Lymphoma Cells Survive Independently of <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> Stat6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Signaling in Culture

( A ) Rnase protection assay for <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA from purified B cells ( <extra_id_0> CD19 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + ) from WT and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic splenocytes .
The <extra_id_0> L32 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> housekeeping genes were used as a loading control .

( B and C ) Immunoblot analysis of WT and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic mice for activated <extra_id_0> pStat6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in ( B ) purified B cells ( <extra_id_0> CD19 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + ) at the time of harvest or in ( C ) whole splenocytes cultured with or without <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

( D and E ) MTS assay of ( D ) WT lymphocytes and ( E ) <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphoma cells cultured with <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , a neutralizing antibody to <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , or a rat IgG isotype control at the indicated concentrations .

The results are the mean +/- SEM of triplicate samples from a single representative experiment that was repeated twice with similar results .
